characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings, Words of Radiance

characterDescription:
Peet was a bridgeman in Highprince Sadeas's army. He is a member of Bridge Four.
After the battle of the Tower, when Dalinar traded his Shardblade to Sadeas for the members of Bridge Four who'd rescued him there, Peet became a member of the King's Guard.
He is enamored of Ka, and connects with her at the Ornery Chull, the tavern at which she works.
